channel.title: Making items untradeable
channel.description: How do I make items untradeable? Delta base

item.title: Making items untradeable
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:4, topic:362195”]ashton51 , what are you talking about? it has nothing to do with client.java

@Topic; go to item.java and search for

dataIn.close();

under it you should see something like this

itemSellable[6570] = false; itemSellable[3101] = false; itemSellable[1949] = false; itemSellable[430] = false; itemSellable[1053] = false; itemSellable[1054] = false; itemSellable[1055] = false; itemSellable[1056] = false; itemSellable[1057] = false;

false = untradable
true = tradeable

copy one of the codes , add it somewhere in the middle and you are done.
just change the numbers
numbers = items ID[/quote]

hmmm… i never did it that way before, but yes i am right, my method works exactly the same in all delta bases

Read full topic

item.title: Making items untradeable
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

ashton51 , what are you talking about? it has nothing to do with client.java

@Topic; go to item.java and search for

dataIn.close();

under it you should see something like this

itemSellable[6570] = false; itemSellable[3101] = false; itemSellable[1949] = false; itemSellable[430] = false; itemSellable[1053] = false; itemSellable[1054] = false; itemSellable[1055] = false; itemSellable[1056] = false; itemSellable[1057] = false;

false = untradable
true = tradeable

copy one of the codes , add it somewhere in the middle and you are done.
just change the numbers
numbers = items ID

Read full topic

item.title: Making items untradeable
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Search (ctrl+f) noTrade in client.java

keep going untill you find something like this

public int[] noTrade = {

once you find this you should find a bunch of numbers in the {}
these are all the item ids of untradable items, simply add a comma to the end and type in the id of the item you want to make untradable

Read full topic
